title: Starving Student friend lasagne
ingredients: ['600g frozen mince', '2 onions, chopped', '2 large carrots, chopped', '1 large red pepper, chopped', '2 cloves fresh garlic, chopped', '200g red lentils', '2 large courgettes, chopped', '2 tins tomatoes (whole or chopped)', '500ml water', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch dried chilli flakes', '4 teaspoons salt', '2 teaspoons black pepper', '125g margarine or butter', '50g plain flour', '4 pints semi-skimmed milk', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '2 packets lasagne sheets', '50g dried hard cheese (Parmesan)', '50g fresh mozzarella']
